data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hughes, Lauren E. (2015): Maeridae from the Indo-Pacific: Elasmopus, Leeuwinella gen. nov., Maeropsis, Pseudelasmopus and Quadrimaera (Amphipoda: Crustacea). Zootaxa 4059 (2): 201-256, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4059.2.1
